title: Add .apply_fn() for chain and chain factory
Synchronized buffer
body:
* added a new function to servicecall to allow only advancing to the service call and then returning the service response future
* buffer can maintain order/backpressure by implementing strict readiness and synchronous calling
* buffer can flush in order or cancel pending buffered futures on shutdown

title: Add ContainerCall future
body: Method returns future that is suitable for spawning into runtime

title: ntex - 0.7
body:
## Changes

* Enforce service readiness during call

* Introduce service sharable readiness

title: ReadBuf::set_dst()/WriteBuf::set_dst() extend existing buffer if exists
Upgrade rustls version to 0.21
body: Since rustls version 0.21.1 has a fix to `ConnectionCommon::complete_io`, I wish to have a try to see if it can resolve this https://github.com/ntex-rs/ntex/issues/190.

title: Add OneRequest service
body: Service that allows to handle one request at time

title: Remove Rc<S> where S: Service as it brakes readiness check validity
body:
* Remove `Rc<S>` where `S: Service` as it brakes readiness check validity
* Add `SharedService`, a service that can be checked for readiness by multiple tasks

title: chore: upgrade glommio to 0.8
body: I believe that fix the CI tests on linux

title: add enter/exit fn for spawn_cbs
body: the callback is run once before polling the spawned future which does not afford the user the ability to take action each time the future is polled. this changes to enter/exit callbacks each time the future is polled. ownership of the pointer created in before is returned to the user in after once and only once.

title: refactor: readme.md to add documentation website
body: Since it's available now could be nice to have it inside the readme

title: Proper handling responses from ws web handler
Make `AppConfig::new()` constructor public
body:
Currently there is no way to construct `AppConfig` with non-default parameters or change it. However this would be useful when creating `web::App`  outside of `web::HttpServer` (eg. for manually created `HttpService`).

There are few methods exists such as `web::App::with_config()` that takes `AppConfig` and it's impossible to pass anything than `AppConfig::default()`.

title: Fix typo in http client error display
Add `ClientResponse::headers_mut()` method
body: This would be useful when implementing reverse proxying, to modify response headers and taking them (without copying)

title: Don't stop h1 dispatcher on upgrade handler with await (#149)
body:
Hi!
fixes  149  (research on  https://github.com/ntex-rs/examples/pull/13#issuecomment-1423991981 )
Don't sure on it.

When upgrade handler has some async context switching (await) dispatcher stops.

title: Better handling service readiness
body:
* Register Dispatcher waker when service is not ready

* Add Io::poll_read_pause() method, pauses read task and check io status

title: [FEATURE] FnShutdown service with on_shutdown callback
body:
Hey following our conversation i tried to implement the `FnShutdown` Service.
Maybe i should have used `FnServiceFactory` instead of `Service` ?

title: [ntex::ws]fix double reserve of mask bytes.
body:
mask bytes was already reserved at https://github.com/ntex-rs/ntex/blob/ce80c79091f5e71f6c58a287757b7e37de2c0371/ntex/src/ws/frame.rs#L172

also removed a redundant as_ref method.

title: Update ntex-service documentation
body: The doc has never been updated since moving from `Request` associated type to a generic type parameter.

title: Do not require mut self in Response::extensions_mut
Fix HeaderMap append order
body:
Currently when append to a HeaderMap, new value would be in front of previous value which is wrong.
This patch makes the appending order right.

title: Fix compilation errors in the openwrt environment
body:
Fix compilation errors in the openwrt environment : 
```
error[E0308]: mismatched types
   --> /home/rust/ntex/ntex-io/src/io.rs:756:19
    |
756 |             data: [0; 16],
    |                   ^^^^^^^ expected an array with a fixed size of 8 elements, found one with 16 elements

```

title: Create the correct PskIdentity type on query
body:
A bug in the newly added PskIdentity query handling where it stores the Vec<u8> instead of PskIdentity(Vec<u8>) inside the query item.

CC @ctron

title: feat: allow extracting TLS SNI server name and TLS PSK identity
body:
This change allows to query for the SNI server name and the PSK identity.

The server name implements only the DNS variant, as this is what both APIs currently seem to support.

The PSK identity is only implemented for OpenSSL, as RustTLS currently doesn't support TLS PSK. But it could be implemented the same way, once this becomes available.

title: Fix transported protocol error on ping request
body: Pong response is being encoded as a transported binary message by WS filter

title: Add ?Sized to Rc service
body: Box has ?Sized added on the line 207, but Rc is missing the same. Needed for GW to be able to use a retry service as a wrapper around another service.

title: [BUGFIX] async-std cannot find function block_on on windows
body:
Hey there!
A little bugfix referring to this [issue](https://github.com/ntex-rs/ntex/issues/115)

Hope it's usefull !

title: Switch to ntex-h2 for http/2 support
impl FromIterator for HeaderMap
body: I don't know if it is useful, but I want to contribute!

title: use MaybeUninit type for header parsing.
body:
use MaybeUninit type for parsing headers and header indices recording.
This would bump MSRV to 1.55 as `MaybeUninit::write` is a safe API stabled at this version. If maintaining current MSRV is important I can make further change and extract the unsafe api under hood.
